definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: The number of gateways and endpoints has little effect.
sentences.chinese: 網關和端點的數量幾乎沒有任何影響。

sentences.english: Furthermore, all gateways only involve control flow, but no data.
sentences.chinese: 而且，所有的網關只涉及控制流，而與數據無關。

sentences.english: You can even write your own filters for deployment in the gateway as well.
sentences.chinese: 您甚至還可以爲網關中的開發編寫您自己的過濾器。

sentences.english: A framework for Distributed Gateway(DG) interworking with H. 323 /SIP is described.
sentences.chinese: SIP交互作用的分佈式網關的一種框架。

sentences.english: Validate the configuration in each of the gateways, and restart the application servers.
sentences.chinese: 在每個網關中驗證配置，然後重新啓動應用服務器。

sentences.english: A splices together two different kinds of protocols .
sentences.chinese: 網關可拼接兩種不同的協議。

sentences.english: Can I use my existing merchant account and/or payment gateway?
sentences.chinese: 我能使用現有的商業賬戶或支付網關嗎？

sentences.english: Protocol bridging is a powerful way of using a gateway.
sentences.chinese: 協議橋接是一種強大的網關使用方法。

sentences.english: The key equipment which joins the telephone and data network is gateways.
sentences.chinese: 連接電話與數據網的關鍵設備就是網關。

sentences.english: We can just change the order of these gateway pairs.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，我們只需更改這些網關對的順序。

sentences.english: Desktop or Gateway policy-based encryption and content filtering.
sentences.chinese: 基於臺式機或網關策略的加密及內容篩選。

sentences.english: We recommend you always use gateways in their corresponding pairs.
sentences.chinese: 我們建議始終按照相應的對使用網關。

sentences.english: A gateway element can have multiple incoming and outgoing sequence flows.
sentences.chinese: 一個網關元素可有多個流入和流出序列流。

sentences.english: This information is sent as a setup message by the signaling gateway back to the MGC.
sentences.chinese: 這種消息作爲建立的消息由信令網關發回給mgc。

sentences.english: Now itâ ™s time to setup the gateway proxy service.
sentences.chinese: 現在是建立網關代理服務的時候了。
